attributes.action: Alter the new national indicator NI186 to measure total CO2 emissions not emissions per capita
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This indicator is intended to help in tackling climate change.  While we still have increasing population, as it currently stands the indicator will allow claims of success in reducing emissions to be made when the overall emissions may actually be increasing.  This does not demonstrate a proper commitment to tackling climate change
